chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:

I received a damaged device. The screen is broken.
Thank you for your help,

Hello Biljana,

You can find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: 

Before you prepare your return:
1. Check out our instructions on how to return an item <https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions>
2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product
3. Remove any protective wrapping or film
4. Pack your product and its accessories according to the tips below

So, pack your product:
• The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product lying flat so it can't move during transport
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also apply an additional label inside for identification if the original one is lost or damaged)
• Take a photo of the package from the inside and outside before you send it. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transit.

Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you when we receive it.

Best,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear ecomobile

The customer would like to receive a replacement device because the device does not meet the requirements as shown in the pictures sent by the customer 

The customer sends it

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. We await the arrival of the parcel.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
